description: Implements Docker Swarm from the SIMPLE Framework

augmented_site_level_config_file.description: The location of the augmented site level configuration file generated by Simple Grid YAML Compiler

network.description: The name of the overlay network that will connect all lightweight components

ingress_network_name.description: The name of the substitute ingress network created by simple

modulepath.description: modulepath to use when running docker swarm related tasks
